headline: How Valuation Resets Are Rewriting The Story For AMERISAFE (AMSF)
summary: The latest research on AMERISAFE trims the fair value estimate from US$49.33 to US$47.67, a modest reset that analysts mainly connect to pressure across the broader property and casualty space rather than a change in the company’s core outlook. With key assumptions like the discount rate and revenue growth essentially held steady, the lower target is more about recalibrating expectations than rewriting the story. Investors can monitor future price target updates as the narrative around...
